global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Sea Slope 1 (SS-1) line 2020-06-13T21:24:23 UTC and recovered 2020-06-30T00:07:30 UTC. It experienced a digifin leak on 2020-06-24 and after several test dives it was recovered.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_380
